thread.title: Miyamoto wanted to make GoldenEye more family-friendly
thread.title_full: Miyamoto wanted to make GoldenEye more family-friendly

title: Miyamoto wanted to make GoldenEye more family-friendly
text:
Miyamoto wanted to make GoldenEye more family-friendly 
Published By: Gamasutra.com - Today 
"He suggested that it might be nice if, at the end of the game, you got to shake hands with all your enemies in the hospital."
